summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 3D Glass Configurator (/customize) and Job Work 3D Configurator (/job-work). All features working correctly: Babylon.js 3D rendering, horizontal step navigation, admin-configurable pricing, hole/cut-out placement with real-time distance measurements, quotation generation with 7/15 day validity, and transport pickup/delivery options with distance-based charges.
seed_data_creation: Test quotations created with TEST_ prefix for workflow testing

features_verified: Babylon.js 3D live preview with glass model
Horizontal step navigation (Glass Type → Thickness → Color → Application → Size → Holes/Cut-outs)
Glass type selection (Toughened ₹85/sq.ft, Laminated ₹120/sq.ft, Frosted ₹95/sq.ft)
Thickness selection with price multipliers (5mm 1.0x, 6mm 1.1x, 8mm 1.25x, 10mm 1.4x, 12mm 1.6x)
Color selection with price percentages (Clear 0%, Grey +10%, Bronze +15%, Blue +15%, Green +10%)
Application selection (Window, Door, Partition, Railing +10%, Shower +15%)
Size input in mm with calculated area in sq.ft and sq.m
Hole/cut-out addition (Circle, Square, Rectangle) with real-time distance measurements from edges
Live price calculation updating in real-time
Price breakdown showing area, thickness multiplier, color percentage, holes total, GST
Quantity selector with +/- buttons
Transport/Delivery option with distance-based charges
Customer search and quotation generation with 7/15 day validity
Babylon.js 3D live preview (Raw Glass)
Job type selection (Glass Toughening, Lamination, Beveling, Drilling & Holes, Edge Processing)
Thickness selection with labour rates per sq.ft (4mm ₹8, 5mm ₹10, 6mm ₹12, 8mm ₹15, 10mm ₹18, 12mm ₹22, 15mm ₹28, 19mm ₹35)
Size input in mm with calculated area
Quantity selector
Hole/cut-out addition with pricing
Transport pickup option with address and distance-based charges (Base ₹300 + ₹12/km)
Transport delivery option with address and distance-based charges (Base ₹300 + ₹12/km)
Labour charges breakdown showing job type, pickup, delivery, subtotal, GST
Customer search and job work quotation generation with 7/15 day validity

Glass Configurator 3D Page.live_price: Updates in real-time as configuration changes
Glass Configurator 3D Page.price_breakdown: Shows detailed breakdown with area, multipliers, GST

Job Work 3D Configurator Page.babylon_canvas: Working - Raw glass model renders correctly
Job Work 3D Configurator Page.transport_options: Pickup and Delivery with distance-based charges
Job Work 3D Configurator Page.labour_breakdown: Shows job type rate, pickup, delivery, GST

context_for_next_testing_agent: 3D Glass Configurator and Job Work Configurator fully tested. Both pages use Babylon.js for 3D visualization. Backend APIs: /api/erp/glass-config/pricing (public), /api/erp/glass-config/calculate-price, /api/erp/glass-config/quotation, /api/erp/glass-config/job-work/labour-rates. Quotation workflow includes draft → sent → viewed → approved/rejected → converted to order. Test file: /app/tests/test_glass_configurator_3d.py with 28 tests. Preview URL: https://glassmesh.preview.emergentagent.com
